description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. New feature: Check for illegal characters in the path on startup  
2. Fixed the issue where translations for some mods were not taking effect, added subname matching for mod translations  
3. Optimized the mod loader detection mechanism  
4. Fixed the issue where information from some mod files could not be read, added support for reading META-INF/jarjar/metadata.json

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.新增功能：启动时检查路径非法字符
2.修复部分模组翻译不生效的问题，增加 subname 匹配模组翻译
3.优化模组加载器检测机制
4.修复部分模组文件无法读取信息的问题，支持读取META-INF/jarjar/metadata.json
